name: Transformers Universe
summary: Transformers Universe was a third person multiplayer online battle arena game developed by British game developer Jagex Games Studio in partnership with American toy company Hasbro. The game was officially unveiled at Botcon 2011,[1] the game went in to closed beta in March 2014[2] and entered open beta on July 4, 2014.[3] The game shut down on January 31, 2015.[4]
